resources.string: Copy link here from TikTok to download it
External Storage permission is needed in order to save the video to your device
Can\'t operate without external storage permission

- Open Queue Screen. 
- Copy the link from TikTok into the input field. 
- Press start. 
- If error happens retry with the refresh button. 

Note: Clicking on video will open the Gallery app.

- In TikTok press share. 
- Select Other. 
- Select TikTok Downloader. 
- You receive a notification about the state of download. 
- If you need to retry, open the App.
The download may fail for various reasons. In such case on the Queue screen you will see a refresh icon. Pressing that will retry the download.

It\'s possible if you try to download too many videos at the same time captcha will be triggered. Since we don\'t want to overload the server, in such case you will need to wait a couple hours to properly retry the download. If that still doesn\'t work you may need to verify a captcha on the same network.
This is an open source project. You can see the repository clicking here.
